_source.text: Actually Ruthlessness paired with Surge Needle Ring is better for Death Knights and Warriors.

text: Actually Ruthlessness paired with Surge Needle Ring **is** **better** for Death **Knights** and **Warriors**.

_source.text: 2011 Review - The Panthers finished outside of the eight by just one point, yet even if they did make the finals, its not sure if they would have performed any better than the Knights did against the Warriors in Week 1.

text: make the finals, its not sure if they would have performed any **better** **than** the **Knights** did against the **Warriors** in Week 1.
